Policy.Description: Test Policies for the ProtoType PolicyEngineAPI

Apply.Description: Check if the CPU Utilization or Memory reach the threshold values.
Spinoff if the VM if CPU or memory value reaches the threshold

Rule.Description: Permit to RESET VM if the values reach the threshold settings.

Apply.Description: Restart VM if this condition is met

Rule.Description: Permit to SpinOff VM if the values reach the threshold settings.

Apply.Description: SpinOff VM if this condition is met
